summary: Worked within the Infrastructure Tribe to design, host, and support both in-house and vendor software solutions across a multi-cloud environment (on-prem and AWS). Specialised in observability, playing a key role in delivering and standardising a scalable observability platform for the UK & Ireland division.
Progressed from Graduate Junior Developer to Second Line Support Engineer, and ultimately to Platform Engineer (SRE focus), and specialised in reliability engineering.

Supported a privately-owned start-up in the enterprise IT space while completing a degree in software engineering. Contributed to internal tooling development and assisted with scraping websites for missing terms and broken links, using scripting languages such as Python.
